title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 20
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: "Of Crawford Moor--born in Leadhill--    Where mineral springs Glengonner fill,      Which joins sweet-flowing Clyde,    Between auld Crawford Lindsay's towers    And where Duneaton rapid pours      His stream to Glotta's tide."
